#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll num=0,n;
ll grid[1000][1000],visited[1000][1000];
ll dfs(ll i,ll j)
{
    if(i<1||i>n||j<1||j>n)
        return 0;
    if(grid[i][j]==1)
    {
        return 0;
    }
    if(visited[i][j])
    	return 0;
    if(i==n&&j==n)
        return 1;
    visited[i][j]=true;
    ll ans=dfs(i+1,j)+dfs(i-1,j)+dfs(i,j+1)+dfs(i,j-1);
    visited[i][j]=false;
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
    ll i,j;
    cin>>n;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
        {
            cin>>grid[i][j];
        }
    }
    cout<<dfs(1,1);
    return 0;
}
